vsParam:
Phew, the training is over, right?
There are more monsters than we thought, I am exhausted...

Exactly. Cresson, don't you feel that Tandrion always
gives you impossible missions?

No, this is nothing!
... Actually, this is an easy one.

I believe there must be deep reasons for the Captain
to arranged so rigorous trainings for me!

What! Hey, [px]! You are so disrespectful
to the Captain! He was an outstanding knight!!

Of course?
My Captain was an outstanding knight, do you know that?

His commands are not to be questioned!
Ha ha ha... Ha ha ha ha!

I know you look forward to becoming a knight...
But that doesn't mean you should trust in Tandrion
unconditionally just because he's one, right?

Certainly. For me, knight is not only my goal...
But also the mightiness I pursue itself!

I was born in a village frequently invaded by monsters...
It was the knights who protected the villagers from the threat.

Everyone there, including me and my siblings... received their
help and support. So I was thinking...

If I become strong enough and become a knight myself...
I could protect my family and everyone in the village.

Oh, I see...
That's why you are so determined to be a knight, huh?...

Yes. But... I didn't pass the exam of the Royal Chivalric Order,
so I came here and worked in the Academy Guard.

But even so, my dream of becoming a knight doesn't wither.
And like I said, the Captain was once an outstanding knight.

Under the guidance of him, I wish to be an outstanding knight!
Hence, I will follow him no matter what!

Hehe, it's great to have a strong will.
We will all cheer for you!

Relatively speaking... Hee hee.
You must protect us, future knight!

Sure. You have my words... Hmm!
There's a flock of monsters over there!

Guys, additional training!
To become the most powerful knight of Bressisle... Kill them all!!

Ah!? No, no, I am exhausted!
Hey, calm down, Cresson!

Ha ha...It's good that you want to protect everyone,
but don't force yourself and don't get hurt...
